title: Bug 50059: Resources not served when metadatacomplete="true" in web.xml
description: Bug 50059: Resources are not served from /WEBINF/lib/{.jar}/METAINF/resources if metadatacomplete="true" is set in web.xml. To reproduce the issue, create a Servlet 3.0 webapp named 'foo' and set metadatacomplete="true" in the web.xml file located in /WEBIBNF/web.xml.2.
OB: To verify the bug, start the web app in Tomcat 7.0.2 and go to http://localhost:8080/foo/index.html in a browser. The expected result is a 200 response with index.html served. However, the actual result is a 404 error.
EB: To reproduce the issue, place a jar file named 'bar.jar' in the /WEBINF/lib directory. (Note that bar.jar is not related to annotations or web fragments.)
